guild.description:
A guild about deleting your Facebook and other social media accounts. Whether due to addiction or just out of principle, this forum is simply about removing social media from your life and living life to the fullest.

[Delete Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/help/224562897555674/)

[Delete Instagram](https://instagram.com/accounts/remove/request/permanent/)

[Delete Twitter](https://help.twitter.com/en/managing-your-account/how-to-deactivate-twitter-account)

[Delete Snapchat](https://accounts.snapchat.com/accounts/delete_account)

[Delete TikTok](https://support.tiktok.com/en/account-and-privacy/deleting-an-account/deleting-an-account)

[Delete Ruqqus???](https://ruqqus.com/settings/security)

[Delete Discord](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/212500837-How-do-I-permanently-delete-my-account-) (Do it already admins!)
